name: Candy Crush Saga
overview:
Candy Crush Saga Prize Arcade Machine is a video redemption arcade game that uses a transparent touch screen and is based on the phenomenally popular mobile/facebook app.

Explore the sweet and colourful world of Candy Crush Saga on a large, transparent 42" touch screen in this fun match-3 puzzle arcade game.

Switch the different coloured candies and jellies around the grid, matching up three of a kind and eliminating candies and jellies from the board. Players will win prizes by completing stages).

This bright and exciting arcade machine with prize redemption will thrill players of all age groups and will work well in a variety of locations due to it's small footprint and addictive gameplay.
